facing-swap mini program

l and my friends participated in a competition which holds by Tencent.In that competition,we made a mini program for ShanXi History Museum called HanTangYiFeng. It is a face-swapping miniprogram.Visitors can use this mini program to change the face of portrait Sculpture. The mini program works like thisï¼š

1.selected a portrait Sculpture Pictures provided by ShanXi History Museum

2.upload a photo(the photo requires having human face in it.the mini program will swap portrait sculpture face with the faces provided by users)

3.enter the texts user want to add into the image

l worked as a pm and front end developer in this project.
